name: MattFacts
0:
”Alexa, open matt fact”
”Alexa, tell matt fact to give me a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: matt fact
des:
Software engineer with a background in sales, marketing and management. I've gained many skills throughout my career including graphic design, photography, audio engineering, video editing, various contact and customer relation management systems, creating data-driven reports, and social media marketing along with many more.

As a developer, I have made full-stack web applications such as Community, a virtual meet-up space that allows you meet and talk with strangers in real time or quackle!, which is recreation of Instagram using React that hosts all the features of it's inspiration.

I have a passion for creating a good user experience, marketing and look forward to continuing my never ending growth as a developer. 

Matt Facts is my first attempt at creating an Alexa skill and I wanted to test the waters a bit before working on a larger project for it.

Feel free to find my portfolio at mmarsden89.github.io
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
